reporter_caption.center: MOELLER v. VERMONT LAW SCHOOL, INC., 137 Vt. 631 (1979)

caption.center: Fabian G. MOELLER v. VERMONT LAW SCHOOL, INC.

opinion.opinion_text: Appellant to file with the clerk on or before July 24, 1979, the printed case and appellant's brief and payment of $100 terms to appellee or appeal dismissed.
